name: Path M Major Salivary Glands
title: Pathologic M
notes: **Note:** Supraclavicular and transverse cervical lymph nodes are coded in regional lymph nodes because they are categorized as N rather than M in TNM.
rows:
Distant lymph node(s):
    Mediastinal (excluding superior mediastinal nodes)

Carcinomatosis

Distant metastasis WITH or WITHOUT distant lymph node(s)

Distant metastasis, NOS

Stated as M1
